snippet: A battery exploded aboard a 787 jet owned by Japan Airlines, the latest in a string of troubles for Boeing’s new aircraft.
abstract: Boeing 787 Dreamliner jet owned by Japan Airlines with no passengers on board catches fire at Logan International Airport in Boston when battery explodes; incident is latest in string of troubles for new aircraft.
lead_paragraph: A battery exploded aboard a 787 jet owned by Japan Airlines, the latest in a string of troubles for Boeing’s new aircraft.

headline.seo: 787 Dreamliner Suffers Electrical Fire in Boston
headline.main: Boeing 787 Suffers a Battery Fire in Boston
headline.print_headline: Boeing 787 Suffers a Battery Fire in Boston
